meta.title: Fiz Rey Armesto - Computer Engineer & VR/AR Developer
meta.description: Fiz Rey Armesto - Computer Engineer & VR/AR Developer. Specialized in Unity, Unreal Engine, and immersive experiences.

hero.name: Fiz Rey Armesto
hero.title: Computer Engineer & VR/AR Developer
hero.description: I create immersive experiences using Unity and Unreal Engine, specializing in VR development and innovative interactive solutions.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a Computer Engineer with a passion for creating immersive digital experiences. My expertise lies in VR/AR development, game programming, and cutting-edge interactive technologies.

development.title: Development
development.description: Unity, Unreal Engine, C#, C++, JavaScript

vrar.title: VR/AR
vrar.description: Immersive experiences, VR gaming, AR applications

arsoft.description: Creation of a railway driving simulator in Unity.

internship.description: Built native Meta Quest 2 surgery simulations from scratch with the UltimateXR framework for Unity.

freelance.description: Creating independent games and VR experiences, participating in game jams, and developing custom solutions for clients.

education.title: Education
education.thesis: Thesis: Development of a multiplayer VR video game using Unreal Engine 5.

c1Advanced.title: C1 Advanced
c1Advanced.description: Certificate of Advanced English (CAE) issued by Cambridge English Language Assessment, part of the University of Cambridge.

cProgramming.title: C Programming
cProgramming.description: Certificate for the completion of the C programming (Basic Level) (6th Edition) issued by the University of Salamanca.

beeShowcase.title: Bee Showcase (Miel 79)
beeShowcase.description: Interactive VR experience showcasing bee conservation and honey production processes.

eyeflow.title: Eyeflow
eyeflow.description: Advanced eye-tracking VR application for medical and research applications.

renfeSimulator.title: Renfe VR Machinist Simulator
renfeSimulator.description: Professional VR training simulator for train operators, providing realistic operational scenarios.

vrsurvival.title: VRSurvival
vrsurvival.description: Multiplayer VR survival game developed with Unreal Engine 5 and VRExpansionPlugin.

yabs.title: YABS - Ludum Dare 55
yabs.description: Game created in 48 hours for Ludum Dare game jam, showcasing rapid prototyping skills.

noche.title: Noche - Indie Spain Jam 2023
noche.description: Lead Programmer role in Spanish indie game jam, creating atmospheric horror experience.

customEditor.title: UE5 Custom Editor Tools Course
customEditor.description: Source code for advanced Unreal Engine 5 editor tools and custom development workflows.

endlessRunner.title: Endless Runner
endlessRunner.description: Game made with Unity as an assignment for an interview, demonstrating core game development skills.

contact.title: Let's Work Together
contact.description: I'm always interested in new opportunities and exciting projects. Whether you need VR development, game programming, or technical consultation, let's connect!
